name: Elemental Corruption: Everard's Quest
description:
Elemental Corruption: Everard's Quest is an action/adventure game inspired by the Legend of Zelda series. Fight your way through a twisting forest and an evil dungeon while battling skeletons, witches, and golems in order to free the four elemental entities and save the world from corruption.

Created by:

Adib Baji, Brandon Ankrum, Jason Phung, Jeff Onyemachi, Jonathan Do, Joshua Dickens, Miguel Tamayo, Pouria Narimisa, Rishi Chitturi
